fxInfo_clarification: This variable is dichotomized in a similar fashion as the V-Dem Multiple Selection questions with each binary answer category suffixed with "_<Response number>".
fxInfo_ordering: This question is asked only if HOCCJ is answered 1, or if HOCCJ is answered 4.
fxInfo_question: Who is involved in the approval of nominations for the Chief Justice of the Highest Ordinary Court?

fxInfo_responses.value: Head of State (use this choice for single executive systems) (0=No, 1=Yes) [CCP tag: CHIEFAP-1]
First (or unicameral) Chamber of the Legislature (0=No, 1=Yes) [CCP tag: CHIEFAP-4]
Second Chamber of the Legislature (0=No, 1=Yes) [CCP tag: CHIEFAP-5]
Judiciary (other than judicial council/commission) (0=No, 1=Yes) [CCP tag: CHIEFAP-7]
Left explicitly to non-constitutional law (0=No, 1=Yes) [CCP tag: CHIEFAP-90]
Other, please specify in the comments section (0=No, 1=Yes) [CCP tag: CHIEFAP-96]

name: e_ccp_chiefap
